name: Knight & Witch - Demo Day 27 combat test
name_original: Knight & Witch - Demo Day 27 combat test
description:
This is a very, veeery short demo for Knight & Witch focused on combat. 

The base gameplay remain the same from the previous demo. Hopefully this time the enemies will be more engaging to fight against and the player characters feel better and more fun to control.

Please be sure to leave feedback and report any bugs you might run into. Thank you! And enjoy this short combat test.
